Package controller

package controller
This package contains the controllers for the SC2002 Project. It includes classes that manage user interactions and application logic, handling tasks such as user authentication, session management, and controlling the flow of data between the model and view components.

The classes in this package are responsible for:

  • Managing user sessions and authentication
  • Handling requests and directing them to appropriate services
  • Interfacing between the model and view components to update the UI based on the model state
  • Implementing business logic for different user roles such as doctors, patients, and pharmacists by calling the model

Since:
2024-11-18
Version:
1.0
Author:
Hoo Jing Huan, Lee Kuan Rong Shane, Lim Wee Keat, Tan Wen Rong, Yeoh Kai Wen
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AdministratorController
    Controls the administrative operations and user interactions specific to administrators.
    AppointmentController
    Controls the operations related to appointments in the medical system.
    DoctorController
    Represents the controller for a doctor in the medical system.
    PatientController
    Represents the controller for a patient in the medical system.
    PharmacistController
    Controls the operations related to pharmacists in the medical system.
    SessionController
    Abstract base class for session controllers.
    UserController
    Represents the controller for a user in the medical system.
